channel.title: [Show off] First model from scratch.[show off!] May turn into a [release]!
channel.description:
HEy everyone this is my first model from scratch... Take a look please no flaming this is my first model from scratch.. Basically its got Armadyl Hilt with a multi coloured blade...
Please give me some pointers on how to do better.
Tell me if you want me to release.
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/buddysword.png[/img]
And this is the v2 version based on your comments.
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/armav2.png[/img] Have fun...
Buddy

item.title: [Show off] First model from scratch.[show off!] May turn into a [release]!
item.dc:creator: @Assassins_Creed_Fan Assassins Creed Fan
item.description:
@Assassins_Creed_Fan wrote:

[quote=“Buddy_budster, post:15, topic:267053”]wow thanks… DO you think i should post my ninja set even though some of them r kinda recoulers and a few leaches? if i give credit to those who gave me them…?[/quote]My advice is : try make your own “ninja set” and no recolours/leeches.
Because allot of people will disrespect you if you do that even if you give the respectfull owners credit.
It still doesn’t make it yours and you might not even have the permission to use them.

Read full topic

item.title: [Show off] First model from scratch.[show off!] May turn into a [release]!
item.dc:creator: @Hellman1 Hellman1
item.description:
@Hellman1 wrote:

[quote=“Buddy_budster, post:9, topic:267053”][quote author=Hellman1 link=topic=352588.msg2704570#msg2704570 date=1236887226]

What colours do u think would work?

I think more red would be cool
[/quote]

ya but red is more like a dragon sword armadyl colours r blue…[/quote]
Yeah, true… Well, I guess you could make the colors blend in a ltitle better. Make the colors a little less vibrant.

Read full topic
